title: Useful Admin Commands
content: Here are some useful admin commands that you can use on the server. Please note, these commands are only available to in-game admins.

title: Spawn Locked Crate for King of the Hill
content: First, you need to get your own coordinates by running the `find_self` command. Then, you can run the `spawn 'hackable' 'X, Y, Z'` command to spawn a locked crate at the coordinates you provided.

title: Find Who Owns a Base
content: You can find out who placed a base by looking at the base and running the `ent who` command. Alternatively, to find multiple teammates, you can look at a code lock or tool cupboard and run the `ent info` command which will show information on everyone authorized.

title: Destroy a Base
content:
If a player is banned from the server, you can destroy ALL their entities by running the `entity.deleteby 'username'` command. This will destroy all their bases, sleeping bags, and anything else they have placed.

If it's a decaying base of a non-banned player, simply look at the base and run the `ent destroybuilding` command.

title: Give Raid Insurance
content:
After verifying a players raid insurance claim, make sure their inventory is empty and run one of the following commands depending on their VIP status:

Tier 1 - `kit givetoplayer ins 'username'`
Tier 2 - `kit givetoplayer vipins 'username'`

Their entitled loot will be given to them.

title: Ban Sleeping Player
content: If a player is sleeping / offline, you can't use the ban button from the playerlist, therefore you will have to use the following command: `BanID 'username'`

title: Grant VIP
content: After verifying a players VIP purchase, you can use the `VIPID 'username'` command to grant them their VIP status.
